revised_title: Description and Classification of the Loblolly-Bay as a New Genus: Gordonia
tldr: John Ellis describes the Loblolly-Bay tree, an elegant evergreen from South Carolina and Florida, and argues that it is a distinct new genus, separate from the Hibiscus and Hypericum families. He proposes the name Gordonia for this new genus in honor of his friend and fellow gardener, James Gordon.
